column4: Musk to invest $20 million in Tesla's $500 million share sale
column5: Tesla Motors Inc CEO Elon Musk will invest $20 million  as part of the company's $500 million stock offering in a show of confidence at a time when the electric car maker is burning through cash.

column4: UPDATE 3-Musk to invest $20 mln in Tesla's $500 mln share sale
column5: Aug 13 Tesla Motors Inc CEO Elon Musk will invest $20 million  as part of the company's $500 million stock offering in a show of confidence at a time when the electric car maker is burning through cash.

column4: Tesla seeks to raise about $500 mln through share sale
column5: Aug 13 Electric-car maker Tesla Motors Inc  said it plans to raise about $500 million through the sale of 2.1 million shares.

column4: MOVES-RBC hires new U.S. semiconductor banker from industry
column5: Aug 12 Royal Bank of Canada has hired a new semiconductor investment banker  John McClure  who joins from Intel Corp  according to an internal memo and the banker's LinkedIn page.

column4: Wall St. ends flat as energy shares drop with oil
column5: U.S. stocks finished flat on Thursday as a drop in energy shares offset a rebound in retail sales and stronger-than-expected Cisco results.
